company_info.Company Description: We are established recruitment firm providing manpower in hyderabad , bangalore , delhi ncr , kolkata , ahmadabad , pune , mumbai in manufacturing , electrical , automobile , IT , tours & travels , hotels , aviation , insurance , banking , finance .

api_data.job_title: Admin Executive ( ONLY MALE )  South Delhi

jd_information.description: Hi ,We have an urgent requirement for Admin Executive for South Delhi Location for our client . GOOD ENGLISH SPEAKING SKILLS REQUIRED  EXPERIENCE : 3-10 YEARS  SALARY - UPTO 17K IN HAND SATURDAY SUNDAY OFF ONLY SOUTH DELHI CANDIDATES ARE ELIGIBLE  Contact on 9560093132 / 9873139718 between 10 am to 7 pm from Monday - Friday . Thanks & Regards,Career Strategy Solutions www.careerstrategysolutions.com
